kuselan chithrapatayata aya dayaka wuye aaradhitha rangapamak lesa ayage naminma ya. 2009 wasare di aya ranganayen dayaka wu "willu (2009 chithrapataya) ", "anjaneyulu" saha"aadawan" yana chithrapata thiragatha wiya. 2010 wasare di aya pradhana niliya washayen rangapa bhasha 4ka chithrapata pahak ma aadayama athin athisarthaka wiya.[38][39] eewa nam "adhurs" (thelingu), "bodigard" (malayalam), "simha" (thelingu), "bos engira baskaran" (damila) saha "supar" (kannada/thelingu) yana chithrapatayi.
